title: Sack of spiders
data: {{version031}} {{item |itemtype=Miscellaneous item |name=sack of spiders |cost= |weight=10 }} {{flavour|A woven silk bag. Opening it will cover the area with webs, spiders, and other skittering things. Evocations skill increases spider quality, quantity, and webbing.}} A '''sack of spiders''' is an evocable item which generates allies themed around the [[Spider's Nest]], and has a chance to create a [[web]] on hostile monsters in your [[line of sight]]. It can be used once being needing to be recharged with XP. [[Evocations]] affects the strength of allies, the chance to web opponents, and number of spiders. This item is [[alternate items|mutually exclusive]] with the [[box of beasts]]. Like with other miscellaneous evocables, only 1 sack of spiders (or box of beasts) will spawn in a given game. ==Useful Info== On use, you'll summon 2 plus (2 * Evocations/27 to 4 * Evocations / 27) spiders, randomly rounded.{{source ref|0.31-b1|evoke.cc|406}} The following monsters can be created, in ascending order of power:{{source ref|0.31-b1|evoke.cc|374}} * {{Monsterlink|Scorpion}} * {{Monsterlink|Redback}} * {{Monsterlink|Culicivora}} * {{Monsterlink|Jumping spider}} * {{Monsterlink|Tarantella}} * {{Monsterlink|Wolf spider}} * {{Monsterlink|Steelbarb worm}} * {{Monsterlink|Demonic crawler}} * {{Monsterlink|Broodmother}} If your [[god]] despises a certain creature, it will be replaced with another one. Summons have a duration of 27 to 171 turns; it does not depend on Evocations skill. You have a 36 + 2 * Evocations % chance to web a hostile monster not already constricted.{{source ref|0.31-b1|evoke.cc|342}} ==Strategy== At low Evocations, a sack of spiders will often make weak allies... but they can still be useful as meat shields, and a [[redback]] or two can be very helpful in the early-game. At high levels of Evocations, it can create powerful allies and consistently web (i.e. [[net]]) enemies. ==History== *In [[0.31]], sacks of spiders were re-introduced and reworked. Prior to this version: **They were a consumable item, which you could find multiple in a game. Each use had a 33% chance to consume the sack. **You could fail to create anything; Evocations skill decreased the chances. **The monster list was significantly different. *Sacks of spiders were removed in [[0.25]]. *Prior to [[0.19]], sacks of spiders didn't stack. Instead, each sack of spiders had 5-15 charges. *Prior to [[0.18]], you could summon [[giant mite]]s, [[spider]]s and [[trapdoor spider]]s at low Evocations. *Prior to [[0.15]], the webs would be placed randomly, rather than targeting enemies. *Sacks of spiders were added in [[0.13]]. ===Old Monster List=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |Monster||Min.
